concept.title: Plot Files to Other Formats
concept.shortdesc: Plots files of various formats, including DWF, PDF, PLT and other files. You can output drawings in any image formats with unique plotter driver. In such cases, Non-systemplotter driver will be configured as output file format. Users are capable of controlling customized properties of each non-system plotter driver in plotter configure editor. You can also obtain specific help for each driver fromthe Help topic in plotter configuration editor.
